title: Orion Premium Lager specifications
statement: Orion Premium Lager is a rice lager from Okinawa, Japan with 5% ABV, served in 21.4 oz size with exhilarating crispness and soft flavor.

citations.quote: ORION PREMIUM LAGER Rice Lager | Okinawa, Japan 21.4 oz | ABV 5% Exhilarating crispness and soft flavor
